parameterExplanation: This file will be subject to the editing process.

This is the cursor position from which the insertion value will be
 inserted. You can determine it by opening the file in any text editor 
and display the cursor position.
This is the cursor position from which the file will coninue as normal.

Any text between the 'start editing at' and 'end editing at' tag
will be replaced by this value.
This is the result of the editing process.
